snippet: The top security official under former President Hosni Mubarak was acquitted of corruption charges on Thursday by the Giza Criminal Court.
abstract: Former Egyptian security official Habib el-Adly is cleared of corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: The top security official under former President Hosni Mubarak was acquitted of corruption charges on Thursday by the Giza Criminal Court.

headline.main: Egypt: Ex-Official Is Cleared of Corruption Charges
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Ex-Official Is Cleared of Corruption Charges
